name: Even Today
description:
I Recommend Full Screen!

WASD To move

For the Cozy Fall Jam 2022 :D

You've got to leave! Staying around too much longer won't help, but enjoy the scenery on the way out.

My first ever entry, and the beginning of me learning to program! And make art, if it wasn't obvious. I've had a lot of fun!

Nothing too serious or deep about any of it, just me learning the basics!
